snippet.title: Sacrifice Of The Beloved | Release Trailer | 2019
snippet.description:
Video quality is not that good because I have a potato :)
=================================================
Sacrifice of the beloved is now available on Itch.io for only 1.99$
buy now @
vishcorp-games.itch.io/sacrifice-of-the-beloved
===============================================
I will also be giving out 10 FREE KEYS for the game
So if you are interested just visit this link and claim yours!

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zMXWmARwLvh8igrWR-lvfVZhgXipcKvWXCzxw2TOgj8/edit?usp=sharing

Please mark the 'TAKEN" column as 'X' .
for a chance to get a FREE KEY.
===============================================
ABOUT THE GAME:

Sacrifice Of The Beloved (SOB) is a game developed by one person(16Y) in the course of 3 months.

STORY:

The game follows the story of a man trying to find source of his nightmares but instead uncovers the mystery of the Patrick Family.
The story shows the pain of a father who blamed himself for what happened to his family, guilt of a mother who lost everything trying to save it
and anger of a child who saw her beloved die in front of her eyes

ABOUT PUZZLES IN THE GAME:
Some of the puzzles are story based so one has to pay attention to the story to solve them easily.

NOTE : IT'S A WEIRD GAME BY A WEIRD PERSON  :|
